title: New: BLACK HONEY – Madonna
body:
Since stepping out of the shadows, Brighton quartet **BLACK HONEY** have played a raucous host of shows around the country, and have now unveiled their last track, released through a unique promotional method – by selling their newest EP on eBay, with the first couple of copies already selling for upwards of £25.

Timed rather perfectly given the Brit-Awards Capegate, _Madonna_ is further proof of their ability to pen a killer chorus, just craving to be played out at festivals across the country.
